title: AuthGate hero: reduce image-to-headline vertical gap

requirements.summary:
Reduce the vertical whitespace between the AuthGate hero image () and main headline (

) by adjusting spacing styles only on those two elements.
acceptanceCriteria: The vertical whitespace between the hero image and the main headline is visibly reduced compared to the current layout.
Only the selected elements’ spacing-related styles are changed; spacing for the subheadline and CTA button group remains unchanged.
No layout overlap/cropping occurs at common responsive breakpoints (mobile and desktop).

Adjust ONLY the selected hero and main

elements’ spacing-related Tailwind classes (e.g., tweak the

negative margin-top and/or add a controlled margin adjustment on the ) to counteract the parent stack gap, while leaving subheadline and CTA group spacing untouched; verify no overlap/cropping at mobile/desktop breakpoints.
